value.title: Using Azure Container Registry for building and deploying .NET Core Apps | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: You probably know that Azure Container Registry enables you to store and manage container images securely, but did you know it can also be used as a part of your DevOps pipelines? Jeremy Likness shows Scott Hanselman how ACR can manage your images and even build them for you in the cloud.   0:00 – Overview

value.title: Using Entity Framework Core with Azure SQL DB and Azure Cosmos DB | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jeremy Likness shows Scott Hanselman how to use Entity Framework (EF) Core with Azure SQL DB and Azure Cosmos DB. EF Core is a lightweight, extensible, open source, and cross-platform version of the popular Entity Framework data access technology.  0:00 – Overview 1:43 – Using Entity Framework Core with

value.title: What is Azure Sentinel and why you should care | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn what Azure Sentinel is and how to use it. Azure Sentinel provides a threat detection and mitigation service that helps you to detect incident and threats when they happen and helps you to solve them as effectively as possible.    For more tips and

value.title: Build the intelligent edge with Azure IoT Edge
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of building IoT solutions with Azure IoT.

topItems.title: Deploy a pre-built module to the Edge device

value.title: Identify principles and practices for responsible AI
value.excerpt: It's imperative to reflect on the implications of AI in business. Discover Microsoft guidelines to set up principles and a governance model in your enterprise.

topItems.title: Identify guiding principles for responsible AI
topItems.excerpt: Explore six principles to guide AI development and use - fairness, reliability and safety, privacy and security, inclusiveness, transparency, and accountability

topItems.title: Identify governing practices for responsible AI
topItems.excerpt: Learn guiding principles for organizations, and how to choose and operationalize a governance system to responsibly and successfully use AI in the enterprise.

topItems.title: Discuss practices for responsible AI at Microsoft
topItems.excerpt: Discover how to translate your organization’s ethical principles into actionable guidance and tools for engineering teams and how AI can improve lives worldwide

value.title: Introduction to version control with Git
value.excerpt: Git is the leading version control tool and essential for developers. Learn how to leverage Git to track your own changes and collaborate with others.

topItems.title: Introduction to Git
topItems.excerpt: Use Git to track changes and collaborate with other developers

topItems.title: Collaborate with Git
topItems.excerpt: Use Git to track changes to source code and collaborate with other developers

topItems.title: Edit code through branching and merging in Git
topItems.excerpt: Level up your Git knowledge by learning about how to keep code separate using branches and how to merge them later

value.title: Manage cloud resources
value.excerpt: The second learning path in a course on Cloud Administration from Carnegie Mellon University. Learn more about how the cloud works by exploring its underlying technology of virtualization, how to take advantage of the cloud for scale, and how to automate cloud resource management.

topItems.title: Understand virtualization
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

topItems.title: Scale your cloud resources with elasticity
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Discover what cloud elasticity means and different ways to scale your cloud resources.

topItems.title: Automate cloud resource management
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about how to automate cloud resource management with scripts and infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform.

value.title: Planning Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: As an IT Professional experienced in SAP solutions, you need to learn about how to leverage Azure resources that include virtual machines, virtual networks, storage accounts, and Azure AD. These modules will give you the Azure knowledge around the reference architecture for SAP Workloads, how to plan for the implementation of SAP solutions on Azure, and the preparation for your migration of SAP workloads to Azure.

topItems.title: Utilize Azure for SAP workloads reference architecture
topItems.excerpt: Utilize Azure for SAP Workloads Reference Architecture

topItems.title: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure

topItems.title: Prepare to migrate SAP workloads to Azure
topItems.excerpt: This module provides details on the important steps prior to deploying SAP workloads to Azure: project preparation and planning, pilot, non-production, production preparation, go live, and post production.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in education
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in education that creates value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Deploy and manage a stateful application using CosmosDB and Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Create and manage a stateful application with an external storage using CosmosDB and Azure Kubernetes Service

value.title: Distributed computing on the cloud: MapReduce
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's cloud developer course. MapReduce was a breakthrough in big data processing that has become mainstream and been improved upon significantly. Learn about how MapReduce works.

value.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use automated machine learning in Azure Machine Learning to find the best model for your data.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure AI and demonstrates how Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure can help make AI real for your organization, whether you want to unlock insights from your latent data with knowledge mining, develop your own AI models with machine learning, or build immersive apps using AI.

value.title: See Azure in action
value.excerpt: The demos in this module provide an opportunity to see Azure in action.

value.title: Deploy Azure Sentinel and connect data sources
value.excerpt: Learn how to deploy Azure Sentinel and connect the services you want to monitor. Then you can use Azure and AI to provide analysis of security alerts.

value.title: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
value.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to recover from infrastructure and service failure, loss of data, and disasters by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

value.title: Learn how to use Solidity
value.excerpt: Discover how Solidity can help you program smart contracts for the Ethereum blockchain platform.

value.title: Write Ethereum smart contracts by using Solidity
value.excerpt: Learn how to install tools that you can use to develop smart contracts.

value.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
value.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

value.title: Build reusable Bicep templates by using parameters
value.excerpt: Control and apply parameters to a Bicep template while protecting sensitive inputs.

value.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure

value.title: Choose a compute provisioning solution for your application
value.excerpt: Discover the services and tools available to automate the deployment and configuration of your Azure infrastructure.
